mix-blend-mode.name: mix-blend-mode
mix-blend-mode.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements, graphics elements and graphics referencing elements. [SVG11]

isolation.name: isolation
isolation.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements, graphics elements and graphics referencing elements. [SVG11]

<blend-mode>.value: normal | multiply | screen | overlay | darken | lighten | color-dodge |color-burn | hard-light | soft-light | difference | exclusion | hue | saturation | color | luminosity

<composite-mode>.value: clear | copy | source-over | destination-over | source-in | destination-in | source-out | destination-out | source-atop | destination-atop | xor | lighter | plus-darker | plus-lighter
